description:
Ryo is wanted for kidnapping the daughter of a foreign minister, even though he`s just coaching her to be a traditional Japanese woman.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Applicant Wants to Be a Traditional Japanese Woman?! Mokkori Can Overcome National Boundaries (Part 1)
Yamato Nadeshiko Shigan!? Mokkori wa Kokkyou o Koete (Zenpen)
大和撫子志願!? モッコリは国境を越えて (前編)
